TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyBinding extends System.Windows.Input.InputBinding

summary.span: 将 绑定到 （或另一个 实现）。

span.span: Binds a to a (or another implementation).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 与 相关联，例如 。A associates a with a , such as a . 是 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 命令系统的 接口的主要实现。 is the primary implementation of the interface for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] commanding system . 通常情况下，当执行 时，将调用命令，尽管命令的行为会进一步受到命令特定的因素（如 值）的影响。In general, when the is executed the command is invoked, although the command behavior is further influenced by command-specific factors such as the value. 有关命令的详细信息，请参阅[命令概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。For more information on commanding, see the [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md). 除了函数键和数字键盘键以外，有效 必须只包含一个 和一个或多个 。With the exception of the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, a valid must contain exactly one and one or more . 功能键和数字键盘键不需要修改键即可成为有效 。Function keys and numeric keypad keys do not require a modifier key in order to be a valid . 可以通过 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 或代码指定无效的 和具有无效关联手势的 。It is possible to specify an invalid and a with an invalid associated gesture, either through [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] or code. 例如，没有用于阻止创建和绑定只包含 nonfunction 键的 ，或仅包含修饰符但没有键的验证。For instance, there is no validation that prevents creating and binding a that contains only a nonfunction key, or only modifiers but no key. 此类 将永远不会尝试调用其关联的命令。Such a will never attempt to invoke its associated command. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 中定义 时，有两种方法可指定 。When defining a in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] there are two ways to specify the . 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 中建立 的第一种方法是定义 元素的 属性，这将启用语法以将键和修饰符指定为单个字符串，例如 "CTRL + P"。The first way to establish a in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to define the attribute of the element, which enables a syntax to specify keys and modifiers as a single string, for example "CTRL+P". 第二种方法是定义 属性和 元素的 属性。The second way is to define the attribute and the attributes of the element. 设置 的两种方法都是等效的，并且修改相同的基础对象，但如果两者都使用，则会发生冲突。Both ways of setting the are equivalent and modify the same underlying object, but there will be a conflict if both are used. 如果已设置 、和 属性，则最后定义的属性将用于该 。In the case when the , , and the attributes are all set, the attribute which is defined last will be used for the . 在某些情况下，您可能会遇到这样的情况：例如， 集最后将只覆盖前面的手势的关键组件，但使该笔势的修饰符保持不变。You can potentially have situations where for example a set last will overwrite just the Key component of a preceding Gesture but leave the Gesture's modifiers the same. 通常，建议仅使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]中的 属性;这将避免多义性，提供最简单的语法，并提供最简单的序列化表示形式。In general, it is recommended that you use only the attribute from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]; this will avoid ambiguity, provides the most streamlined syntax, and provides the most straightforward representation for serialization. 可以通过在 类上注册 ，在特定对象上或在类级别上定义 。A can be defined on a specific object or at the class level by registering a on the class. 定义 的最典型方法是在控件模板内，通过声明一个或多个 或 元素来设置 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 中的 属性。The most typical way to define a is within the control template, setting the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] by declaring one or more or elements. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并将其添加到根窗口的 中。The following example creates a and adds it to the of the root window. [!code-xaml[commandWithHandler#CommandHandlerKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/commandWithHandler/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandhandlerkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[CommandHandlerProcedural#CommandHandlerKeyBindingCodeBehind](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandHandlerProcedural/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandhandlerkeybindingcodebehind)] [!code-vb[CommandHandlerProcedural#CommandHandlerKeyBindingCodeBehind](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandHandlerProcedural/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandhandlerkeybindingcodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了函数键和数字键盘键以外， 必须包含 和一个或多个 。With the exception of the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, a must contain a and one or more . 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 中定义 时，有两种方法可指定 。When defining a in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] there are two ways to specify the . 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 中建立 的第一种方法是定义 元素的 属性，这将启用语法以将键和修饰符指定为单个字符串，例如 "CTRL + P"。The first way to establish a in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to define the attribute of the element, which enables a syntax to specify keys and modifiers as a single string, for example "CTRL+P". 第二种方法是定义 属性和 元素的 属性。The second way is to define the attribute and the attributes of the element. 设置 的两种方法都是等效的，并且修改相同的基础对象，但如果两者都使用，则会发生冲突。Both ways of setting the are equivalent and modify the same underlying object, but there will be a conflict if both are used. 如果已设置 、和 属性，则最后定义的属性将用于该 。In the case when the , , and the attributes are all set, the attribute which is defined last will be used for the . 在某些情况下，您可能会遇到这样的情况：例如， 集最后将只覆盖前面的手势的关键组件，但使该笔势的修饰符保持不变。You can potentially have situations where for example a set last will overwrite just the Key component of a preceding Gesture but leave the Gesture's modifiers the same. 通常，建议仅使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]中的 属性;这将避免多义性，提供最简单的语法，并提供最简单的序列化表示形式。In general, it is recommended that you use only the attribute from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]; this will avoid ambiguity, provides the most streamlined syntax, and provides the most straightforward representation for serialization.
